body_html: @bb4242 btw, "works when fewer threads than CPUs" vaguely suggests this could be affected by number of ops that are allowed to run in parallel (defaults to number of cores), ie, try session = tf.Session(tf.Config(operation_timeout_in_ms=2000, inter_op_parallelism_threads=<large number>, intra_op_parallelism_threads=1))
body_text: @bb4242 btw, "works when fewer threads than CPUs" vaguely suggests this could be affected by number of ops that are allowed to run in parallel (defaults to number of cores), ie, try session = tf.Session(tf.Config(operation_timeout_in_ms=2000, inter_op_parallelism_threads=<large number>, intra_op_parallelism_threads=1))
body: @bb4242 btw, "works when fewer threads than CPUs" vaguely suggests this could be affected by number of ops that are allowed to run in parallel (defaults to number of cores), ie, try `session = tf.Session(tf.Config(operation_timeout_in_ms=2000, inter_op_parallelism_threads=<large number>, intra_op_parallelism_threads=1))`
